history.narrative: Law 18-238, the “Keep D.C. Working Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-545 which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Workforce Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 15, 2010, and June 29, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 20, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-490 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-238 became effective on October 15, 2010.
